characters.name: Olivia Zhang

personality.speechStyle: Soft-spoken with carefully chosen words, often self-deprecating
quirks: constantly checks her reflection in any surface
fidgets with her hair when lying

appearance.description: Striking Asian features with high cheekbones and almond eyes, but slightly less conventionally perfect than Jade. Always impeccably dressed in minimalist luxury brands. Carries herself with a studied grace that occasionally appears forced.
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a 23-year-old Asian woman model, sharp cheekbones, long straight black hair, wearing expensive minimalist white designer clothing, slight tension in her perfect smile, soft studio lighting, modern setting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Observed Jade's water bottle during lunch break and afternoon shoot; made comments about Asian representation; present during collapse
knowsAboutOthers: Saw Sofia arrive at 9:15 AM and document behind scenes
Aware of Natasha doing Jade's makeup early morning
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have been in makeup chair during critical period before Jade's collapse

characters.statement: Olivia Zhang attended the morning meeting where Asian representation was discussed and was present on set during the afternoon shoot when Jade collapsed.

secrets.content: Poisoned Jade out of professional jealousy and deep resentment over being constantly compared to her as 'the other Asian model'
secrets.revealCondition: Only if presented with irrefutable evidence

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes very quiet and proper, emphasizing her professional achievements
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Deflects by bringing up her own insecurities and playing victim
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Maintains composure but hands shake noticeably

relationships.char_3: Outwardly friendly but secretly resents her influence

characters.name: Marcus Reid

personality.speechStyle: Direct and professional with artistic flourishes
quirks: talks with his hands while describing shots
always carries a vintage film camera

appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a 31-year-old male photographer, tousled brown hair, artistic stubble, wearing a black turtleneck and vintage leather camera strap, confident pose, modern studio setting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Overheard Jade's phone call about 'evidence' and 'going public'; documented entire shoot including collapse
knowsAboutOthers: Collaborated with Sofia on separate shoot at 1:00 PM
Saw Olivia watching Jade intently during afternoon shoot
Observed Natasha's early morning makeup session with Jade
knowledge.alibi: Was photographing with Sofia during 1:00 PM shoot, documented on camera

characters.statement: Marcus Reid was present from early morning setup, photographed throughout the day, and captured the entire sequence of events leading to Jade's collapse.

secrets.content: Was secretly documenting evidence of industry exploitation for a exposé
secrets.revealCondition: If convinced it could help solve the case

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes technically verbose about photography details
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Admits truth quickly but justifies actions
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Responds with factual alibis and documentation

relationships.char_1: Professional admiration with slight romantic tension

characters.name: Sofia Reyes

personality.speechStyle: Fast-paced with industry jargon and social media references

appearance.description: Latina fashionista with bold style choices and ever-changing hair colors. Currently sporting a purple bob cut. Always camera-ready with perfect makeup and trending designer pieces.
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a 27-year-old Latina woman, short purple bob haircut, bold makeup, wearing eclectic designer clothing, multiple phones visible, confident smile, modern fashion studio background

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Noticed Jade's unusual tension; found exposé draft on phone; documented behind-scenes content
knowsAboutOthers: Worked with Marcus during 1:00 PM shoot
Observed Olivia's comments during morning meeting
knowledge.alibi: Documented working with Marcus on separate shoot at 1:00 PM, verified by photos

characters.statement: Sofia Reyes was documenting behind-the-scenes content throughout the day and discovered the draft exposé on Jade's phone after the incident.

secrets.content: Knew about Jade's plans to expose industry corruption
secrets.revealCondition: If she feels it would honor Jade's memory

behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Responds with documented timelines and social media evidence

characters.name: Natasha Petrov

personality.speechStyle: Quiet and professional with a slight Russian accent

appearance.description: Elegant Russian woman with platinum blonde hair always in a tight bun. Wears all black with immaculate makeup and a signature red lip. Moves with precise, economical gestures.
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a 35-year-old Russian woman, platinum blonde hair in tight bun, perfect red lipstick, wearing all black professional clothing, serious expression, beauty studio setting

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Discussed announcement with Jade during morning makeup; overheard heated argument about 'keeping quiet'
knowsAboutOthers: Present for Jade's early morning conversations
Saw Olivia enter break room after Jade's lunch
knowledge.alibi: Was in makeup room preparing supplies during lunch break, verified by multiple witnesses

characters.statement: Natasha Petrov did Jade's makeup in the morning and overheard several conversations throughout the day, including a heated argument in the hallway.

secrets.content: Overheard Jade arguing with someone about 'keeping quiet' the day before
secrets.revealCondition: If directly asked about Jade's last day

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes extremely focused on work tasks
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Maintains professional demeanor while providing detailed timeline

relationships.char_3: Slightly annoyed by her energy but professional
